page.title: 14INDUSTRY FORRES WEST
page.content: In the west of Forres there is a whole range of different industries, consisting of commercial and industrial manufacturing. In the commercial sector there are different kinds of work eg. shops, ranging from small sweet shops to big clothes stores. There are also distributing depots and warehouses, like White's Removal Company and Tarmac Construction is a big civil engineering group. There are lots of factories at Greshop, which is on the Western outskirts of Forres. There are agricultural suppliers, wood merchants, some garages and a big dairy which serves most of Forres. Forres hasn't got a lot of industries, but we think it has enough.
